description.lang: Webee system integrates with hundreds of compatible third-party devices that users can control and monitor from anywhere using Webee mobile app, desktop portal or TV dashboard as well as use locally without Internet connection. Users can receive real time power consumption notifications alerting of any changes in temperature, motion, luminosity, and more. Using artificial intelligence and real-time data, the smart devices adapt the household conditions to the current environment. For example, by giving orders to the lamps to turn off when there is no movement in a room. Users can also create scenarios with related sequences of actions and rules by grouping specific tasks. For example, the "welcome home" scenario will automatically turn on entrance lights and adjust temperature levels when the front door is opened. These features can continue to work locally without Internet connection.SecurityWebee Home Monitoring system allows users to secure and monitor their home from anywhere. The Armed Away mode locks all doors and activate sensors and alarms to send alerts when there is unexpected activity while users are away from home. The Armed Stay mode ensure safety by sending notifications while users are inside. Home monitoring gives the TV a new function as the alerts will run on the TV while checking the security cameras, watching shows or running any application. Users can measure energy consumption and receive recommendations to save energy and money using the energy dashboard.EntertainmentWebee Smart home hub is also an entertainment system that connects to the TV set to be used as Smart TV box integrating video functionality into the connected home experience. Users can download Android apps, access to full streaming and multimedia services such as Netflix, connect speakers like Sonos to the TV, play games, and more.
